summary: this add some new monsters to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
hello everyone im skull19972 and this is my third mod
as you know i hate retex so this is not a retex
THE LEGENDARY Creatures add new 20 creatures to the game you can see the pic
they are the boss of their kind not a new creatures but they are verry difficult to diffeat
Legendary giant legendary slaughfish legendary troll legendary mudcrav legendary sphere robot legendary werewolf legendary sabrecat legendary wolf legendary dragon ect...
they are many many creatures so i can\'t tell you all in the discreption but i add all the boss of their kinds with names for example the legendary dragon is with the name  Khruzofiil and the legendary slaughfish is with the name Sharksiil ect... 
some of them are giant some of them are little but all of them are verry difficult to kill and once you kill one of them you will find a tresor in their bodys
this is my mod just some new chalenger so lets see if you can kill them ....
once again im sorry of my bad english
check my first mod THE LEGENDARY WARRIORS 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23534
and my second mod THE POWER OF THE DOVAHKIIN
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23537
hahahaha im sure if you use my first mod the legendary warriors and you get a follower from those legendary warrior and if you take the power of the dovahkiin  from my second mod im sure that you will defeat those creatures from this mod but i assure even if you take a legendary follower and the power of the dovahkiin it will be not easy to kill one of those dangerous beasts but you will win after all im sure that you are a strong dovahkiin .....
Goodbye everyone im skull19972 and this is my third mod ENJOY!!!!!!!!
author: my other 20 mods
